title: The billion dollar bike-sharing race hits the U.S.
text:
The billion dollar bike-sharing race hits the U.S. 10:03am GMT - 02:16 
A bike-sharing craze that has swept China over the past two years is picking up speed in cities across the United States, but with a different spin as tough local regulations rein in the roll-out of dockless bikes.   
A bike-sharing craze that has swept China over the past two years is picking up speed in cities across the United States, but with a different spin as tough local regulations rein in the roll-out of dockless bikes.  //reut.rs/2piQ7QR
